reviewText: He likes it he has always liked the German Bundeswehr and he got KUSTENWACHE he has been wanting to get it so I got it for him but when he went and put it in the dvd player it wouldn't work my son said it wouldn't work because it is a German disc so in order to watch it we have to get a German dvd player my son knows some German but he cant read all the German words on the back of the box so he went on google translate and found out what the words ment but now we have to get a German dvd player
